experience: You and Jordi both know David Norris, Luke Hohmann, and 9 others
Inbenta and Bluleader Announce Partnership to Enhance the Customer Experience With AI-Powered Technology

Leading a multi award winning technology firm that has doubled in size year on-year, since 2005, I help clients increase the efficienty of their Call Centre, Ecommerce and Social Media platforms through incorporating Natural Language Search technology.Driving down the cost of your customer interaction, while increasing online revenues is the panacea for today’s customer service and online management executives.With leading-edge Natural Language Search technology that my company, Inbenta, has been developing since 2005, I am now helping organizations such as Burger King, Citibank & Ingersoll Rand reach this panacea!

EADA is founded on the values of effort, commitment and work well done. Its mission is to contribute to a fairer, more balanced and sustainable society. I'm teaching Strategy and Enterpreneurship to young and older students alike.

recommendations: March 26, 2013, Julie A. worked with Jordi but at different companies

Even though I wrapped up the consulting project that brought us together last year, I often think about Jordi as a visionary/leader and someone that I look forward to working with again. He brought me in to help inbenta land some key meetings with F500 companies here in the US for their natural language processing technology. Jordi is strategic, articulate, thoroughly engaging and passionate about his "'baby" inbenta, which recently won the Gold European Seal of e-Excellence 2013. Congratulations to Jordi and his team both here and in Barcelona.

summary: Leading a multi award winning technology firm that has doubled in size year on-year, since 2005, I help clients increase the efficienty of their Call Centre, Ecommerce and Social Media platforms through incorporating Natural Language Search technology.Driving down the cost of your customer interaction, while increasing online revenues is the panacea for today’s customer service and online management executives.With leading-edge Natural Language Search technology that my company, Inbenta, has been developing since 2005, I am now helping organizations such as Burger King, Citibank & Ingersoll Rand reach this panacea!YOUR CHALLENGE► I need to reduce the number of e-mails and phone calls received by my contact centers► My CEO has tasked me with boosting web traffic by over 10% this quarter!► 50% of my potential web customers leave the site half way through their first transaction and I want them back!HOW I CAN HELP?► Inbenta's platform allows users to search products, categories, services, and also social media posts and have their queries understood and answered automatically with a 97% accuracy.► Inbenta's customers experience 15% growth in organic website traffic, thanks to our Automated Long-Tail SEO► Inbenta's Virtual Assistant component engages in conversations with your Internet users and guide them to your conversion funnel.Currently, I am on the lookout on LinkedIn for professionals performing Online Marketing, Ecommerce and Call Centre leadership roles that are looking to reduce and avoid costs, while boosting revenues through utilizing innovative technology.
name: Jordi Torras
title: Giving users the power to find relevant information online using natural language technology - CEO at Inbenta
